name: the last brain cell
description:
CONTAINS 9 ENDINGS! ABSTRACT

Enter the human mind from a perspective of a brain cell and understand it's behavior. You are the last brain cell, now it's up to you to grow and multiply or follow illogical ideas that will ultimately result in it's extinction. 

FEATURES
  • 9 Endings that depend on your interaction with the world.
  • Teaches you a thing or two about the human brain.
  • Made completely by a single developer in around 48 hours.
  • Highly un-replayable (cause some games are only meant to be experienced once)

Made for the Unexpected Game Jam. 

Feel free to refer to the attached pdf in the zip for additional details and font credits!
